title: Race condition during load of SonarSensor

content.raw:
I observerd a failure of `UNIT_SonarSensor_TEST` on the gazebo7 branch ([full details here](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/a03568207039a83e4ab159b65a8103ed)).

The test fails to run with an error message about `pure virtual method called`.
The `World::RunLoop` thread is calling `gazebo::physics::ODEPhysics::UpdateCollision` and aborts.
Meanwhile, the sensor thread is still loading the sensor,
calling [MeshShape::SetScale](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/edc64bd8e855202dcba61ce729f50a07a21f1148/gazebo/physics/MeshShape.cc?at=gazebo7&fileviewer=file-view-default#MeshShape.cc-109)
at [SonarSensor.cc:155](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/edc64bd8e855202dcba61ce729f50a07a21f1148/gazebo/sensors/SonarSensor.cc?at=gazebo7&fileviewer=file-view-default#SonarSensor.cc-155).

Console output:

~~~
273: [ RUN      ] SonarTests/SonarSensor_TEST.CreateSonar/0
273: [Dbg] [SonarSensor_TEST.cc:187] Physics ode paused 0
273: [Msg] Waiting for master.
273: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
273: [Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.2.90
273: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:207] ServerFixture load in 1.1 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
273: Warning [parser.cc:438] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
273: pure virtual method called
273: terminate called without an active exception
273: 
~~~
content.html:
I observerd a failure of UNIT_SonarSensor_TEST on the gazebo7 branch (full details here).

The test fails to run with an error message about pure virtual method called. The World::RunLoop thread is calling gazebo::physics::ODEPhysics::UpdateCollision and aborts. Meanwhile, the sensor thread is still loading the sensor, calling MeshShape::SetScale at SonarSensor.cc:155.
